title: Box And Cover, "Baikal and Angara", 1950–60
markings: Marks: On underside of base: Highta mark stamped in blue
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Lid of box in the form of bearded male figure and other smaller female figure amid watery scrolls; base of box with releif decoration of fish.

tombstone.epitaph:
Box And Cover, "Baikal and Angara", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-100-a,b.
